```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(records)
```

## Introduction

This vignette demonstrates use of `record_stats()` for mean, variance and distribution
for a few models.

```{r examples}
record_stats("iid", "mean", T = 30)
record_stats("DTRW", "mean", T = 100, approx = TRUE)
record_stats("DTRW", "dist", T = 20, m = 4, approx = TRUE)
```
